name: Orby
description:
Orby is an action-survival game that restricts your playing area with each shot you miss. 

Defend yourself from continuous waves of terrifying enemies by shooting them and avoid touching anything. 

You have unlimited bullets, but be careful! The edges of the screen grow tighter with every shot you miss!

CONTROLS

Movement: W,A,S,D or arrow keys
Shoot: Spacebar

Have fun, relax and if you’re the competitive type, don’t forget to share your  High Score with us!
